TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IBinarySerialize

summary.span: 为用户定义类型 (UDT) 和用户定义聚合的序列化和反序列化提供自定义实现。

span.span: Provides custom implementation for user-defined type (UDT) and user-defined aggregate serialization and deserialization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 需要用户定义的类型 (Udt) 和用户定义的聚合来定义存储格式, 可以是。`Native`User-defined types (UDTs) and user-defined aggregates are required to define a storage format, which can be either .`Native` 或。`UserDefined`or .`UserDefined`. .`Native`.`Native` 允许 SQL Server 自动处理序列化和反序列化, 但格式对其可以处理的类型类型有限制。allows SQL Server to handle serialization and deserialization automatically, but the format has restrictions on the kind of types it can handle. .`UserDefined`.`UserDefined` 允许用户定义类型和聚合处理其自己的序列化。allows user-defined types and aggregates to handle their own serialization. 用户定义类型和聚合必须标记为。`UserDefined`User-defined types and aggregates must be marked with .`UserDefined` `SqlUserDefinedType`在或`SqlUserDefinedAggregate`特性中 , 和必须实现接口。in the `SqlUserDefinedType` or `SqlUserDefinedAggregate` attribute, and must implement the interface. 请注意, 即使使用自定义序列化, 每个实例的总大小必须小于允许的最大限制, 当前为8000字节。Note that even with custom serialization, the total size of each instance must be under the maximum allowed limit, currently 8000 bytes.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Read(class System.IO.BinaryReader r) cil managed

param.name: r
param.span: 对象从中进行反序列化的 流。

span.span: The stream from which the object is deserialized.

summary.span: 从用户定义类型 (UDT) 或用户定义聚合的二进制格式生成用户定义的类型或用户定义的聚合。

span.span: Generates a user-defined type (UDT) or user-defined aggregate from its binary form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法必须使用方法编写的信息重建您的对象。 The method must reconstitute your object using the information written by the method. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了 UDT 的方法的实现, 该方法使用来反序列化以前保存的 UDT。The following example shows the implementation of the method of a UDT, which uses a to de-serialize a previously persisted UDT. 此示例假设 UDT 具有两个数据属性: `StringValue`和。 `DoubleValue`This example assumes that the UDT has two data properties: `StringValue` and `DoubleValue`. [!code-csharp[DataWorks IBinarySerialize Samples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks IBinarySerialize Samples/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks IBinarySerialize Samples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks IBinarySerialize Samples/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Write(class System.IO.BinaryWriter w) cil managed

param.name: w
param.span: UDT 或用户定义聚合所序列化到的 流。

span.span: The stream to which the UDT or user-defined aggregate is serialized.

summary.span: 将用户定义的类型 (UDT) 或用户定义的聚合转换为其二进制格式，以便保留。

span.span: Converts a user-defined type (UDT) or user-defined aggregate into its binary format so that it may be persisted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将足够多的信息写入二进制流, 以允许方法重建 UDT 或用户定义的聚合。Write sufficient information to the binary stream to allow the method to reconstitute your UDT or user-defined aggregate. ## Examples 下面的示例演示 如何实现 udt 的方法, 该方法使用来序列化用户定义的二进制格式的 UDT。The following example shows the implementation of the method of a UDT, which uses a to serialize the UDT in the user-defined binary format. Null 字符填充的目的是确保字符串值与 double 值完全分离, 因此, 在 Transact-sql 代码中将一个 UDT 与另一个 UDT 进行比较, 将字符串字节与字符串字节进行比较, 将双字节与双字节进行比较字节.The purpose of the null character padding is to ensure that the string value is completely separated from the double value, so that one UDT is compared to another in Transact-SQL code, string bytes are compared to string bytes and double bytes are compared to double bytes. [!code-csharp[DataWorks IBinarySerialize Samples#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks IBinarySerialize Samples/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[DataWorks IBinarySerialize Samples#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks IBinarySerialize Samples/VB/source.vb#2)]
